title: Knowledge Management Problem-Solving Process Based on Collaborative Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of organizational operations and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Non-degree long-term professional education program for adult practitioners in a smartphone-centric constrained technology environment, featuring a constructivist approach with enhanced practical training for beginners in knowledge management

learning_goals: Learners can design knowledge-sharing systems using collaboration tools in virtual organizational scenarios.
Learners can diagnose, analyze, and propose solutions for knowledge management issues arising in simulation games.
Learners can complete team projects by applying real-time communication strategies in remote collaboration environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
